title: PODE Framework-Based Task Design to Improve Nursing Writing Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing concepts and simple documentation experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments with formative assessment-driven feedback.

learning_goals: Learners clearly define nursing documentation objectives using the PODE framework.
Learners can structurally describe nursing interventions according to patient scenarios
Learners can incorporate feedback on writing through smartphone-based formative assessment tools with over 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
